title: "Setup Google Workspace"
execute:
  echo: false
---

## Step 1: Make a spreadsheet and save it

1. Open the ETH IT Knowledge Base: <https://unlimited.ethz.ch/display/itkb>
2. Search for "Google Workspace" on the landing page and open the documentation: <https://unlimited.ethz.ch/display/itkb/Google+Workspace>
3. Under "Registration", click on the image of the slideshow PDF to open it.
4. Follow the steps in the slideshow to setup your ETH Google Workspace account.

## Step 2: Create a folder in shared drive

1. Open the following link to a Google Drive folder: <https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1LW5j1n4Xv3Tyb4JMsUHUDmIYbJ-int68>
2. Create a bookmark for this folder in your bookmarks folder of your browser.
3. Open the md-03 folder.
4. Create a new folder and use your GitHub username as the name of the folder.
5. Enter your folder.
6. Create a new spreadsheet and name it `rbtl-fs24-waste-characterisation`.
